anya-e0103n2:1_0: 22. Appā icchā etassāti appiccho, paccayagedharahito. Tassa bhāvo appicchatā, alobhajjhāsayatāti
anya-e0103n2:1_1: attho. Samaṁ tuṭṭhi, santena, sakena vā tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi, santuṭṭhi eva santuṭṭhitā,
anya-e0103n2:1_2: aññaṁ apatthetvā yathāladdhehi itarītarehi paccayehi paritussanā. Santuṭṭhitādīhīti
anya-e0103n2:1_3: ta-kāro vā padasandhikaro. ‘‘Santuṭṭhiādīhī’’ti vā pāṭho. Te guṇeti te sīlavodānassa
anya-e0103n2:1_4: hetubhūte appicchatādiguṇe. Sampādetunti sampanne kātuṁ. Te hi sīlavisuddhiyā paṭiladdhamattā
anya-e0103n2:1_5: hutvā dhutadhammehi sampannatarā honti. Dhutaṅgasamādānanti kilesānaṁ dhunanakaaṅgānaṁ
anya-e0103n2:1_6: viddhaṁsanakāraṇānaṁ sammadeva ādānaṁ. Evanti evaṁ sante, dhutaṅgasamādāne kateti
anya-e0103n2:1_7: attho. Assa yogino. Sallekho kilesānaṁ sammadeva likhanā chedanā tanukaraṇaṁ. Paviveko
anya-e0103n2:1_8: cittavivekassa upāyabhūtā vivekaṭṭhakāyatā. Apacayo yathā paṭipajjanato kilesā naṁ
anya-e0103n2:1_9: apacinanti na ācinanti, tathā paṭipajjanā. Vīriyārambho anuppannānaṁ pāpadhammānaṁ
anya-e0103n2:1_12: Sīlañceva yathāsamādinnaṁ paṭipakkhadhammānaṁ dūrībhāvena suparisuddhaṁ bhavissati.
anya-e0103n2:1_13: Vatāni ca dhutadhammā ca sampajjissanti sampannā bhavissanti, nipphajjissanti vā.
anya-e0103n2:1_14: Yā thirabhūtā itarītaracīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanasantuṭṭhi porāṇānaṁ buddhādīnaṁ ariyānaṁ
anya-e0103n2:1_15: paveṇibhāvena ṭhitā, tattha patiṭṭhitabhāvaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘porāṇe ariyavaṁsattaye
anya-e0103n2:1_16: patiṭṭhāyā’’ti. Bhāvanā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti bhāvanārāmo, tabbhāvo bhāvanārāmatā,
anya-e0103n2:1_17: samathavipassanābhāvanāsu yuttappayuttatā. Yasmā adhigamāraho bhavissati, tasmāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n2:2_0: Lābhasakkārādi taṇhāya āmasitabbato, lokapariyāpannatāya ca lokāmisaṁ. Nibbānādhigamassa
anya-e0103n2:2_1: anulomato anulomapaṭipadā vipassanābhāvanā. Atthatoti vacanatthato. Pabhedatoti vibhāgato.
anya-e0103n2:2_2: Bhedatoti vināsato. Dhutādīnanti dhutadhutavādadhutadhammadhutaṅgānaṁ. Samāsabyāsatoti saṅkhepavitthārato.
anya-e0103n2:3_1: ussitaṭṭhena. ‘‘Nadiyā kūla’’ntiādīsu viya samussayattho kūla-saddoti āha ‘‘paṁsukūlamiva
anya-e0103n2:3_2: paṁsukūla’’nti. Ku-saddo kucchāyaṁ ula-saddo gatiatthoti āha ‘‘kucchitabhāvaṁ gacchatīti
anya-e0103n2:3_3: vuttaṁ hotī’’ti, paṁsu viya kucchitaṁ ulati pavattatīti vā paṁsukūlaṁ. Paṁsukūlassa
anya-e0103n2:3_4: dhāraṇaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ uttarapadalopena, taṁ sīlamassāti paṁsukūliko, yathā ‘‘āpūpiko’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:3_5: Aṅgati attano phalaṁ paṭicca hetubhāvaṁ gacchatīti aṅgaṁ, kāraṇaṁ. Yena puggalo ‘‘paṁsukūliko’’ti
anya-e0103n2:3_6: vuccati, so samādānacetanāsaṅkhāto dhammo paṁsukūlikassa aṅganti paṁsukūlikaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:3_7: Tenāha ‘‘paṁsukūlikassā’’tiādi. Tassāti samādānassa. Samādiyati etenāti samādānaṁ, cetanā.
anya-e0103n2:4_0: Eteneva nayenāti yathā paṁsukūladhāraṇaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ, taṁsīlo paṁsukūliko, tassa aṅgaṁ
anya-e0103n2:4_1: samādānacetanā ‘‘paṁsukūlikaṅga’’nti vuttaṁ, evaṁ eteneva vacanatthanayena ticīvaradhāraṇaṁ
anya-e0103n2:4_2: ticīvaraṁ, taṁsīlo tecīvariko, tassa aṅgaṁ samādānacetanā ‘‘tecīvarikaṅga’’nti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:4_3: Saṅghāṭiādīsu eva tīsu cīvaresu ticīvarasamaññā, na kaṇḍupaṭicchādivassikasāṭikādīsūti
anya-e0103n2:5_0: Taṁ piṇḍapātanti parehi diyyamānānaṁ piṇḍānaṁ patte patanasaṅkhātaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ, taṁ
anya-e0103n2:5_1: uñchatīti piṇḍapātiko, yathā bādariko sāmākiko. Piṇḍapāti eva piṇḍapātiko, yathā
anya-e0103n2:5_2: bhaddo eva bhaddako. Avakhaṇḍanaṁ vicchindanaṁ nirantaramappavatti. Tappaṭikkhepato
anya-e0103n2:5_3: anavakhaṇḍanaṁ avicchindanaṁ nirantarappavatti. Saha apadānenāti saha anavakhaṇḍanena.
anya-e0103n2:5_4: Sapadānanti padassa kiriyāvisesanabhāvaṁ, yattha ca taṁ anavakhaṇḍanaṁ, tañca dassetuṁ
anya-e0103n2:5_5: ‘‘avakhaṇḍanarahitaṁ anugharanti vuttaṁ hotī’’ti vuttaṁ. Ekāsaneti iriyāpathantarena
anya-e0103n2:5_6: anantaritāya ekāyayeva nisajjāya. Patte piṇḍoti ettha vatthubhedo idhādhippeto, na
anya-e0103n2:5_7: sāmaññaṁ. Eva-kāro ca luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassento ‘‘kevalaṁ ekasmiṁyeva patte’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n2:5_8: Uttarapadalopaṁ katvā ayaṁ niddesoti dassento ‘‘pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṁ
anya-e0103n2:5_9: katvā’’ti āha. Esa nayo ito paresupi.
anya-e0103n2:6_0: Pacchābhattaṁ nāma pavāraṇato pacchā laddhabhattaṁ eva. Khalu-saddassa paṭisedhatthavācakattā
anya-e0103n2:6_1: tena samānatthaṁ na-kāraṁ gahetvā āha ‘‘na pacchābhattiko’’ti. Sikkhāpadassa visayo
anya-e0103n2:6_2: sikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhitto. Yo tassa avisayo, so eva samādānassa visayoti āha ‘‘samādānavasena
anya-e0103n2:6_3: paṭikkhittātirittabhojanassā’’ti. Abbhokāse nivāso abbhokāso. Susāne nivāso susānaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:6_4: taṁ sīlaṁ assātiādinā sabbaṁ vattabbanti āha ‘‘eseva nayo’’ti. Yathāsanthataṁ viya
anya-e0103n2:6_5: yathāsanthataṁ, ādito yathāuddiṭṭhaṁ. Taṁ hesa ‘‘idaṁ bahumaṅkuṇaṁ duggandhapavāta’’ntiādivasena
anya-e0103n2:6_6: appaṭikkhipitvāva sampaṭicchati. Tenevāha ‘‘idaṁ tuyha’’ntiādi. Sayananti nipajjanamāha.
anya-e0103n2:6_7: Tena tena samādānenāti tena tena paṁsukūlikaṅgādikassa samādānena dhutakilesattāti
anya-e0103n2:6_9: taṁ kilesadhunanaṁ, tāniyeva idha dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgānīti adhippetāni, na aññāni
anya-e0103n2:6_10: yāni kānici, aññena vā dhutassāti ayamattho atthato āpanno. ‘‘Ñāṇaṁ aṅgaṁ etesa’’nti
anya-e0103n2:6_11: iminā ñāṇapubbakataṁ tesaṁ samādānassa vibhāveti. Paṭipattiyāti sīlādisammāpaṭipattiyā.
anya-e0103n2:6_12: Samādiyati etenāti samādānaṁ, samādānavasena pavattā cetanā, taṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etesanti
anya-e0103n2:9_0: Samādānacetanāya gahaṇaṁ taṁmūlakattā pariharaṇacetanāpi dhutaṅgameva. Attanā, parammukhena
anya-e0103n2:9_1: ca kusalabhaṇḍassa bhusaṁ viluppanaṭṭhena loluppaṁ taṇhācāro, tassa viddhaṁsanakiccattā
anya-e0103n2:9_2: loluppaviddhaṁsanarasāni. Tato eva nilloluppabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhanti, taṁ vā paccupaṭṭhāpentīti
anya-e0103n2:10_0: Bhagavatova santike samādātabbānīti idaṁ antarā avicchedanatthaṁ vuttaṁ, rañño santike
anya-e0103n2:10_1: paṭiññātārahassa atthassa tadupajīvino ekaṁsato avisaṁvādanaṁ viya. Sesānaṁ santike
anya-e0103n2:10_2: samādānepi eseva nayo. Ekasaṅgītikassāti pañcasu dīghanikāyādīsu nikāyesu ekanikāyikassa.
anya-e0103n2:10_3: Aṭṭhakathācariyassāti yassa aṭṭhakathātantiyeva visesato paguṇā, tassa. Etthāti attanāpi
anya-e0103n2:10_4: samādānassa ruhane. Jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthūti so kira thero nesajjiko
anya-e0103n2:10_5: , tassa taṁ na koci jānāti. Athekadivasaṁ rattiyā sayanapiṭṭhe nisinnaṁ vijjulatobhāsena
anya-e0103n2:10_6: disvā itaro pucchi ‘‘kiṁ, bhante, tumhe nesajjikā’’ti. Thero dhutaṅgappicchatāya
anya-e0103n2:10_7: tāvadeva nipajjitvā pacchā samādiyīti evamāgataṁ vatthu.
anya-e0103n2:12_1: paviṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. ‘‘Pabbajito gaṇhissatī’’ti ṭhapitakaṁ siyā gahapaticīvaraṁ,
anya-e0103n2:12_2: na pana gahapatidānacīvaranti tādisaṁ nivattetuṁ dānaggahaṇaṁ. Aññatarenāti ettha
anya-e0103n2:12_3: samādānavacanena tāva samādinnaṁ hotu, paṭikkhepavacanena pana kathanti? Atthato
anya-e0103n2:12_4: āpannattā. Yathā ‘‘devadatto divā na bhuñjatī’’ti vutte ‘‘rattiyaṁ bhuñjatī’’ti atthato
anya-e0103n2:12_5: āpannameva hoti, tassa āhārena vinā sarīraṭṭhiti natthīti, evamidhāpi bhikkhuno gahapatidānacīvare
anya-e0103n2:12_6: paṭikkhitte tadaññacīvarappaṭiggaho atthato āpanno eva hoti, cīvarena vinā sāsane ṭhiti natthīti.
anya-e0103n2:13_0: Evaṁ samādinnadhutaṅgenātiādividhānaṁ paṁsukūlikaṅge paṭipajjanavidhi. Susāne laddhaṁ
anya-e0103n2:13_1: sosānikaṁ. Taṁ pana yasmā tattha kenaci chaḍḍitattā patitaṁ hoti, tasmā vuttaṁ ‘‘susāne
anya-e0103n2:13_2: patitaka’’nti. Evaṁ pāpaṇikampi daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tālaveḷimaggo nāma mahāgāme ekā vīthi.
anya-e0103n2:13_3: Anurādhapureti ca vadanti. Ḍaḍḍho padeso etassāti ḍaḍḍhappadesaṁ, vatthaṁ. Magge
anya-e0103n2:13_5: Thokaṁ rakkhitvāti katipayaṁ kālaṁ āgametvā. Vātāhatampi sāmikānaṁ satisammosena
anya-e0103n2:13_6: patitasadisanti ‘‘sāmike apassantena gahetuṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti vuttaṁ. Tasmā thokaṁ āgametvā gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_0: ‘‘Saṅghassa demā’’ti dinnaṁ, coḷakabhikkhāvasena laddhañca laddhakālato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n2:14_1: ‘‘samaṇacīvaraṁ siyā nu kho, no’’ti āsaṅkaṁ nivattetuṁ ‘‘na taṁ paṁsukūla’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_2: Na hi taṁ tevīsatiyā uppattiṭṭhānesu katthaci pariyāpannaṁ. Idāni imināva pasaṅgena
anya-e0103n2:14_3: yaṁ bhikkhudattiye lakkhaṇapattaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ, tassa ca ukkaṭṭhānukkaṭṭhavibhāgaṁ
anya-e0103n2:14_4: dassetuṁ ‘‘bhikkhudattiyepī’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha gāhetvā vā dīyatīti saṅghassa vā
anya-e0103n2:14_5: gaṇassa vā dentehi yaṁ cīvaraṁ vassaggena pāpetvā bhikkhūnaṁ dīyati. Senāsanacīvaranti
anya-e0103n2:14_6: senāsanaṁ kāretvā ‘‘etasmiṁ senāsane vasantā paribhuñjantū’’ti dinnacīvaraṁ. Na taṁ
anya-e0103n2:14_7: paṁsukūlanti apaṁsukūlabhāvo pubbe vuttakāraṇato, gāhetvā dinnattā ca. Tenāha ‘‘no
anya-e0103n2:14_8: gāhāpetvā dinnameva paṁsukūla’’nti. Tatrapīti yaṁ gāhetvā na dinnaṁ bhikkhudattiyaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:14_9: tatrapi yena bhikkhunā cīvaraṁ dīyati, tassa lābhe, dāne ca visuṁ visuṁ ubhayattha
anya-e0103n2:14_10: ādaragāravānaṁ sabbhāvato, tadabhāvato ca bhikkhudattiyassa ekatosuddhi ubhatosuddhi
anya-e0103n2:14_11: anukkaṭṭhatā hontīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘yaṁ dāyakehī’’tiādi vuttaṁ, pādamūle ṭhapetvā
anya-e0103n2:14_12: dinnakaṁ samaṇenāti adhippāyo. Yassa kassacīti ukkaṭṭhādīsu yassa kassaci. Ruciyāti
anya-e0103n2:15_1: nissayesu attanā yathāpaṭiññātadutiyanissayānurūpāya paṭipattiyā vijjamānatā. Ārakkhadukkhābhāvoti
anya-e0103n2:15_3: abhāvo savisesalūkhasabhāvattā. Pāsādikatāti paresaṁ pasādāvahatā. Appicchatādīnaṁ
anya-e0103n2:15_5: samādāya vattanaṁ yāvadeva upari sammāpaṭipattisampādanāyāti vuttaṁ ‘‘sammāpaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n2:15_6: anubrūhana’’nti. Mārasenavighātāyāti mārassa, mārasenāya ca vihananāya viddhaṁsanāya.
anya-e0103n2:15_7: Kāyavācācittehi yato saṁyatoti yati, bhikkhu. Dhāritaṁ yaṁ lokagarunā paṁsukūlaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:15_8: taṁ ko na dhāraye, yasmā vā lokagarunā paṁsukūlaṁ dhāritaṁ, tasmā ko taṁ na dhārayeti
anya-e0103n2:15_9: yojanā yaṁtaṁsaddānaṁ ekantasambandhibhāvato. Paṭiññaṁ samanussaranti upasampadamāḷe
anya-e0103n2:15_10: ‘‘āma bhante’’ti ācariyapamukhassa saṅghassa sammukhā dinnaṁ paṭiññaṁ samanussaranto.
anya-e0103n2:18_1: appaṭikkhipitabbato. Aññataravacanenāti ettha yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
anya-e0103n2:18_2: Yāva na sakkoti, yāva na labhati, yāva na sampajjatīti paccekaṁ yāva-saddo sambandhitabbo.
anya-e0103n2:18_3: Na sampajjatīti na sijjhati. Nikkhittapaccayā doso natthīti nicayasannidhidhutaṅgasaṁkilesadoso
anya-e0103n2:18_4: natthi. Āsanneti cīvarassa āsanne ṭhāne. Rajanakkhaṇe paribhuñjanakāsāvaṁ rajanakāsāvaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:18_5: Tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇaṁ nāma attano, parassa vā santakaṁ senāsane paccattharaṇavasena
anya-e0103n2:18_6: adhiṭṭhitaṁ. ‘‘Aṁsakāsāvaṁ parikkhāracoḷaṁ hoti, iti paccattharaṇaṁ, aṁsakāsāvanti
anya-e0103n2:18_7: imāni dvepi atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitānipi dhutaṅgabhedaṁ na karontī’’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0103n2:18_8: vuttanti vadanti. Pariharituṁ pana na vaṭṭatīti rajanakāle eva anuññātattā niccaparibhogavasena
anya-e0103n2:18_9: na vaṭṭati tecīvarikassa. Aṁsakāsāvanti khandhe ṭhapetabbakāsāvaṁ. Kāyaparihārikenāti
anya-e0103n2:18_10: vātātapādiparissayato kāyassa pariharaṇamattena. Samādāyevāti gahetvā eva. Appasamārambhatāti
anya-e0103n2:18_11: appakiccatā. Kappiye mattakāritāyāti nisīdanādivasena, parikkhāracoḷavasena ca bahūsu
anya-e0103n2:18_12: cīvaresu anuññātesupi ticīvaramatte ṭhitattā. Saha pattacaraṇāyāti sapattacaraṇo. Pakkhī sapakkhako.
anya-e0103n2:21_1: atirekalābhaṁ, saṅghabhattādinti attho. Sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbabhattaṁ saṅghabhattaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:21_2: Katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā dātabbabhattaṁ uddesabhattaṁ. Ekasmiṁ pakkhe ekadivasaṁ
anya-e0103n2:21_3: dātabbabhattaṁ pakkhikaṁ. Uposathe uposathe dātabbabhattaṁ uposathikaṁ. Paṭipadadivase
anya-e0103n2:21_4: dātabbabhattaṁ pāṭipadikaṁ. Vihāraṁ uddissa dātabbabhattaṁ vihārabhattaṁ. Dhuragehe
anya-e0103n2:21_5: eva ṭhapetvā dātabbabhattaṁ dhurabhattaṁ. Gāmavāsīādīhi vārena dātabbabhattaṁ vārakabhattaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:21_7: vaṭṭantīti bhikkhāpariyāyena vuttattā. Bhesajjādipaṭisaṁyuttā nirāmisasalākā. Yāvakālikavajjāti
anya-e0103n2:21_8: ca vadanti. Vihāre pakkabhattampīti upāsakā idheva bhattaṁ pacitvā ‘‘sabbesaṁ ayyānaṁ
anya-e0103n2:21_9: dassāmā’’ti vihāreyeva bhattaṁ sampādenti, taṁ piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. Āharitvāti
anya-e0103n2:21_10: pattaṁ gahetvā gehato ānetvā. Taṁ divasaṁ nisīditvāti ‘‘mā, bhante, piṇḍāya carittha,
anya-e0103n2:21_11: vihāreyeva bhikkhā ānīyatī’’ti vadantānaṁ sampaṭicchanena taṁ divasaṁ nisīditvā.
anya-e0103n2:21_13: (dī. ni. 3.309; a. ni. 4.28) dhammakathā. Dhammarasanti dhammūpasañhitaṁ pāmojjādirasaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:22_0: Jaṅghabalaṁ nissāya piṇḍapariyesanato kosajjanimmaddanatā. ‘‘Yathāpi bhamaro puppha’’ntiādinā
anya-e0103n2:22_1: (dha. pa. 49; netti. 123) vuttavidhinā āhārapariyesanato parisuddhājīvatā. Niccaṁ
anya-e0103n2:22_3: sekhiyapaṭipattipūraṇaṁ. Paṭiggahaṇe mattaññutāya, saṁsaṭṭhavihārābhāvato ca aparapositā.
anya-e0103n2:22_4: Kule kule appakaappakapiṇḍagahaṇena parānuggahakiriyā. Antimāya jīvikāya avaṭṭhānena
anya-e0103n2:22_5: mānappahānaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘antamidaṁ, bhikkhave, jīvikānaṁ, yadidaṁ piṇḍolya’’ntiādi
anya-e0103n2:22_6: (itivu. 91; saṁ. ni. 3.80). Missakabhattena yāpanato rasataṇhānivāraṇaṁ. Nimantanāsampaṭicchanato
anya-e0103n2:23_0: Appaṭihatavuttitāya catūsupi disāsu vattanaṭṭhena cātuddiso. Ājīvassa visujjhatīti
anya-e0103n2:23_1: ājīvo assa visujjhati. Attabharassāti appānavajjasulabharūpehi paccayehi attano bharaṇato
anya-e0103n2:23_2: attabharassa. Tato eva ekavihāritāya saddhivihārikādīnampi aññesaṁ aposanato anaññaposino.
anya-e0103n2:23_3: Padadvayenāpi kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena vicaraṇato
anya-e0103n2:23_4: sallahukavuttitaṁ, subharataṁ, paramaappicchataṁ, santuṭṭhiñca dasseti. Devāpi pihayanti

anya-e0103n2:23_7: devāpi pihayanti patthenti. Tassa sīlādiguṇesu bahumānaṁ uppādentā ādaraṁ janenti,

anya-e0103n2:26_1: duppavesanaṭṭhānaṁ. Puratoti vīthiyaṁ gacchantassa purato gharaṁ apaviṭṭhasseva.
anya-e0103n2:26_2: Pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānanti pesakāravīthiyaṁ pesakārabhāvaṁ nimminitvā ṭhitassa sakkassa
anya-e0103n2:26_3: gharadvāre pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṁ. Ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātiko taṁ divasaṁ na bhikkhaṁ āgamayamāno

anya-e0103n2:29_0: 28.Nānāsanabhojananti anekasmiṁ āsane bhojanaṁ, ekanisajjāya eva abhuñjitvā visuṁ
anya-e0103n2:29_1: visuṁ nisajjāsu āhāraparibhoganti attho. Patirūpanti yuttarūpaṁ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṁ. Vattaṁ
anya-e0103n2:29_2: kātuṁ vaṭṭatīti vattaṁ kātuṁ yujjati. Vattaṁ nāma garuṭṭhānīye kattabbameva. Tattha
anya-e0103n2:29_3: pana paṭipajjanavidhiṁ dassetuṁ yaṁ theravādaṁ āha ‘‘āsanaṁ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṁ
anya-e0103n2:29_4: vā’’tiādi. Tassattho – ekāsanikaṁ bhikkhuṁ bhuñjantaṁ āsanaṁ vā rakkheyya, dhutaṅgabhedato
anya-e0103n2:29_5: yāva bhojanapariyosānā na vuṭṭhātabbanti vuttaṁ hoti . Bhojanaṁ vā rakkheyya dhutaṅgabhedato,
anya-e0103n2:29_6: abhuñjiyamānaṁ yāva bhuñjituṁ nārabhati, tāva vuṭṭhātabbanti attho. Yasmā tayidaṁ
anya-e0103n2:29_7: dvayaṁ idha natthi, tasmā vattakaraṇaṁ dhutaṅgaṁ na rakkhatīti adhippāyo. Tenāha
anya-e0103n2:29_9: vaṭṭantīti dasseti. Appābādhatāti arogatā. Appātaṅkatāti akicchajīvitā sarīradukkhābhāvo.
anya-e0103n2:29_10: Lahuṭṭhānanti kāyassa lahuparivattitā. Balanti sarīrabalaṁ. Phāsuvihāroti sukhavihāro.
anya-e0103n2:29_11: Sabbametaṁ bahukkhattuṁ bhuñjanapaccayā uppajjanavikārapaṭikkhepapadaṁ. Rujāti rogā.
anya-e0103n2:29_12: Na kammamattanoti attano yogakammaṁ purebhattaṁ, pacchābhattañca na parihāpeti, bahuso
anya-e0103n2:32_0: 29.Appaṭikūlaṁkatvā bhuñjituṁ vaṭṭati paṭikūlassa bhuttassa agaṇhanampi siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:32_1: Pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhitabbanti ‘‘ekabhājanameva gaṇhāmī’’ti bahuṁ gahetvā na chaḍḍetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:32_2: Nānārasataṇhāvinodananti nānārasabhojane taṇhāya vinodanaṁ. Atra atra nānābhājane
anya-e0103n2:32_3: ṭhite nānārase icchā etassāti atriccho, tassa bhāvo atricchatā, tassā atricchatāya
anya-e0103n2:32_4: pahānaṁ. Āhāre payojanamattadassitāti asambhinnanānārase gedhaṁ akatvā āhāre satthārā
anya-e0103n2:32_5: anuññātapayojanamattadassitā. Visuṁ visuṁ bhājanesu ṭhitāni byañjanāni gaṇhato tattha
anya-e0103n2:32_6: tattha sābhogatāya siyā vikkhittabhojitā, na tathā imassa ekapattagatasaññinoti vuttaṁ
anya-e0103n2:35_0: 30. Bhuñjantassa yaṁ upanītaṁ, tassa paṭikkhepena taṁ atirittaṁ bhojananti atirittabhojanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:35_1: Puna bhojanaṁ kappiyaṁ kāretvā na bhuñjitabbaṁ, tabbisayattā imassa dhutaṅgassa.
anya-e0103n2:35_2: Tenāha ‘‘idamassa vidhāna’’nti. Yasmiṁ bhojaneti yasmiṁ bhuñjiyamāne bhojane. Tadeva
anya-e0103n2:35_3: bhuñjati, na aññaṁ. Anatirittabhojanapaccayā āpatti anatirittabhojanāpatti, tato
anya-e0103n2:35_4: dūrībhāvo anāpajjanaṁ. Odarikattaṁ ghasmarabhāvo kucchipūrakatā, tassa abhāvo ekapiṇḍenāpi
anya-e0103n2:35_5: yāpanato. Nirāmisasannidhitā nihitassa abhuñjanato. Puna pariyesanavasena pariyesanāya
anya-e0103n2:35_6: khedaṁ na yāti. Abhisallekhakānaṁ santosaguṇādīnaṁ vuddhiyā sañjananaṁ santosaguṇādivuḍḍhisañjananaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_0: 31.Gāmantasenāsanaṁpahāya araññe aruṇaṁ uṭṭhāpetabbanti ettha gāmantaṁ, araññañca
anya-e0103n2:38_1: sarūpato dassetuṁ ‘‘tattha saddhiṁ upacārenā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha gāmapariyāpannattā
anya-e0103n2:38_2: gāmantasenāsanassa ‘‘gāmoyeva gāmantasenāsana’’nti vuttaṁ. Yo koci satthopi gāmo
anya-e0103n2:38_3: nāmāti sambandho. Indakhīlāti ummārā. Tassāti leḍḍupātassa. Vinayapariyāyena araññalakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0103n2:38_4: adinnādānapārājike (pārā. 92) āgataṁ. Tattha hi ‘‘gāmā vā araññā vā’’ti anavasesato
anya-e0103n2:38_5: avahāraṭṭhānapariggahe tadubhayaṁ asaṅkarato dassetuṁ ‘‘ṭhapetvā gāmañcā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_6: Gāmūpacāro hi loke gāmasaṅkhameva gacchatīti. Nippariyāyato pana gāmavinimuttaṁ ṭhānaṁ
anya-e0103n2:38_7: araññameva hotīti abhidhamme (vibha. 529) gāmā ‘‘nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā, sabbametaṁ
anya-e0103n2:38_9: pacchima’’nti āgataṁ āraññikaṁ bhikkhuṁ sandhāya. Na hi so vinayapariyāyike ‘‘araññe
anya-e0103n2:38_10: vasanato āraññiko pantasenāsano’’ti sutte vutto. Ayañca suttasaṁvaṇṇanāti idha sabbattha
anya-e0103n2:38_11: suttantakathāva pamāṇaṁ. Tasmā tattha āgatameva lakkhaṇaṁ gahetabbanti dassento ‘‘taṁ
anya-e0103n2:38_12: āropitena ācariyadhanunā’’tiādinā minanavidhiṁ āha. Teneva hi majjhimaṭṭhakathānayova
anya-e0103n2:38_13: (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.296) idamettha pamāṇanti ca vutto.
anya-e0103n2:39_0: Tato tato magganti tattha tattha khuddakamaggaṁ pidahati. Dhutaṅgasuddhikena dhutaṅgasodhanapasutena.
anya-e0103n2:39_1: Yathāparicchinne kāleti ukkaṭṭhassa tayopi utū, majjhimassa dve, mudukassa eko utu.
anya-e0103n2:39_2: Tatthapi dhutaṅgaṁ na bhijjati saussāhattā. Nipajjitvā gamissāmāti cittassa sithilabhāvena
anya-e0103n2:39_3: dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjatīti vuttaṁ. Araññasaññaṁ manasi karontoti ‘‘ahaṁ vivekavāsaṁ vasissāmi,
anya-e0103n2:39_4: yathāladdhova kāyaviveko sātthako kātabbo’’ti manasikārasabbhāvato ‘‘bhabbo…pe… rakkhitu’’nti
anya-e0103n2:39_5: vuttaṁ. Assa āraññikassa cittaṁ na vikkhipanti āpāthamanupagamanato. Vigatasantāso
anya-e0103n2:39_6: hoti vivekaparicayato. Jīvitanikantiṁ jahati bahuparissaye araññe nivāseneva maraṇabhayassa
anya-e0103n2:39_7: dūrīkaraṇato. Pavivekasukharasaṁ assādeti anubhavati janasaṁsaggābhāvato. Ārādhayantoti
anya-e0103n2:39_8: anunayanto. Yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipattiyā vivekassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato āraññikaṅgayogino
anya-e0103n2:42_1: dvinnaṁ rājūnaṁ rajjasīmāya ṭhitarukkho. Tattha hi tesaṁ rājūnaṁ balakāyo upagantvā
anya-e0103n2:42_2: antarantarā yuddhaṁ kareyya, corāpi pāripanthikā samosarantā bhikkhussa sukhena nisīdituṁ
anya-e0103n2:42_3: na denti. Cetiyarukkho ‘‘devatādhiṭṭhito’’ti manussehi sammatarukkho pūjetuṁ upagatehi
anya-e0103n2:42_4: manussehi avivitto hoti. Niyyāsarukkho sajjarukkhādi. Vaggulirukkho vaggulinisevito.
anya-e0103n2:42_5: Sīmantarikarukkhādayo saparissayā, dullabhavivekā cāti āha ‘‘ime rukkhe vivajjetvā’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:42_6: Paṇṇasaṭanti rukkhato patitapaṇṇaṁ. Paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīditabbaṁ rukkhamūlikabhāvassa
anya-e0103n2:42_7: paṭicchādanatthaṁ. Channe vāsakappanā dhammassavanādīnamatthāyapi hoti. Tasmā ‘‘jānitvā
anya-e0103n2:43_0: Abhiṇhaṁ tarupaṇṇavikāradassanenāti abhikkhaṇaṁ tarūsu, tarūnaṁ vā paṇṇesu vikārassa
anya-e0103n2:43_2: Devatāhīti rukkhadevatāhi. Tāpi hi rukkhaṭṭhavimānesu vasantiyo rukkhesu vasanti.
anya-e0103n2:43_3: Ayampi rukkheti sahavāsitā. Vaṇṇitoti ‘‘appāni cevā’’tiādinā pasaṁsito. ‘‘Rukkhamūlasenāsanaṁ
anya-e0103n2:43_4: nissāya pabbajjā’’ti (mahāva. 73, 128) evaṁ nissayoti ca bhāsito. Abhirattāni taruṇakāle,
anya-e0103n2:43_5: nīlāni majjhimakāle, paṇḍūni jiṇṇakāle. Patitāni milāyanavasena. Evaṁ passanto tarupaṇṇāni
anya-e0103n2:43_6: paccakkhato eva niccasaññaṁ panūdati pajahati, aniccasaññā evassa saṇṭhāti. Yasmā
anya-e0103n2:46_0: 33. ‘‘Rukkhamūlaṁ paṭikkhipāmī’’ti ettake vutte channaṁ appaṭikkhittameva hotīti
anya-e0103n2:46_2: hi samādānaṁ ijjhati, no aññathāti. ‘‘Dhammassavanāyā’’ti imināva dhammaṁ kathentenāpi
anya-e0103n2:46_3: uposathadivasādīsu suṇantānaṁ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṁ tehi yācitena channaṁ pavisituṁ
anya-e0103n2:46_4: vaṭṭati, dhammaṁ pana kathetvā abbhokāsova gantabbo. Rukkhamūlikassāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n2:46_5: Uposathatthāyāti uposathakammāya. Uddisantenāti paresaṁ uddesaṁ dentena. Uddisāpentenāti
anya-e0103n2:46_6: sayaṁ uddesaṁ gaṇhantena. Maggamajjhe ṭhitaṁ sālanti sīhaḷadīpe viya maggā anokkamma
anya-e0103n2:46_7: ujukameva pavisitabbasālaṁ. Vegena gantuṁ na vaṭṭati asāruppattā. Yāva vassūparamā
anya-e0103n2:46_8: ṭhatvā gantabbaṁ, na tāva dhutaṅgabhedo hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:47_0: Rukkhassaanto nāma rukkhamūlaṁ. Pabbatassa pana pabbhārasadiso pabbatapadeso. Acchannamariyādanti
anya-e0103n2:47_1: yathā vassodakaṁ anto na pavisati, evaṁ chadanasaṅkhepena upari akatamariyādaṁ. Anto
anya-e0103n2:47_2: pana pabbhārassa vassodakaṁ pavisati ce, abbhokāsasaṅkhepamevāti tattha pavisituṁ
anya-e0103n2:47_3: vaṭṭati. Sākhāmaṇḍapoti rukkhasākhāhi viraḷacchannamaṇḍapo. Pīṭhapaṭo khalitthaddhasāṭako.
anya-e0103n2:48_0: Paviṭṭhakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati yathāvuttapabbhārādike ṭhapetvāti adhippāyo. Jānitvāti
anya-e0103n2:48_1: dhammassavanādiatthaṁ channaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pavisitvā nisinno ‘‘idāni aruṇo uṭṭhahatī’’ti
anya-e0103n2:48_2: jānitvā. Rukkhamūlepi katthaci attheva nivāsaphāsukatāti siyā tattha āsaṅgapubbako
anya-e0103n2:48_3: āvāsapalibodho, na pana abbhokāseti idheva āvāsapalibodhupacchedo ānisaṁso vutto.
anya-e0103n2:48_4: Pasaṁsāyānurūpatāti aniketāti vuttapasaṁsāya anālayabhāvena anucchavikatā. Nissaṅgatāti
anya-e0103n2:48_5: āvāsapariggahābhāveneva tattha nissaṅgatā. Asukadisāya vasanaṭṭhānaṁ natthi, tasmā
anya-e0103n2:48_6: tattha gantuṁ neva sakkāti edisassa parivitakkassa abhāvato cātuddiso. Migabhūtenāti
anya-e0103n2:48_7: pariggahābhāvena migassa viya bhūtena. Sitoti nissito. Vindatīti labhati.

anya-e0103n2:52_0: Sosānikena nāma appakiccena sallahukavuttinā bhavitabbanti dassetuṁ ‘‘tasmiṁ pana
anya-e0103n2:52_1: vasantenā’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Garukanti dupparihāraṁ. Tameva hi dupparihārabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ
anya-e0103n2:52_3: corā katakammāpi akatakammāpi osaranti, tattha coresu bhaṇḍasāmike disvā bhikkhusamīpe
anya-e0103n2:52_4: bhaṇḍaṁ chaḍḍetvā palātesu manussā bhikkhuṁ ‘‘coro’’ti gahetvā potheyyuṁ, tasmā vihāre
anya-e0103n2:52_5: saṅghattheraṁ vā gocaragāme raññā niyuttaṁ rājayuttakaṁ vā attano sosānikabhāvaṁ
anya-e0103n2:52_6: jānāpetvā yathā tādiso, añño vā parissayo na hoti, tathā appamattena vasitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:52_7: Caṅkamantassa yadā āḷahanaṁ abhimukhaṁ na hoti, tadāpi saṁvegajananatthaṁ tattha
anya-e0103n2:52_8: diṭṭhi vissajjetabbāti dassetuṁ ‘‘addhakkhikena āḷahanaṁ olokentenā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:53_0: Uppathamaggena gantabbaṁ attano sosānikabhāvassa apākaṭabhāvatthaṁ. Ārammaṇanti tasmiṁ
anya-e0103n2:53_1: susāne ‘‘ayaṁ vammiko, ayaṁ rukkho, ayaṁ khāṇuko’’tiādinā divāyeva ārammaṇaṁ vavatthapetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:53_2: Bhayānakanti bhayajanakaṁ vammikādiṁ. Kenaci leḍḍupāsāṇādinā āsanne vicarantīti na
anya-e0103n2:53_3: paharitabbā. Tilapiṭṭhaṁ vuccati palalaṁ. Māsamissaṁ bhattaṁ māsabhattaṁ. Guḷādīti
anya-e0103n2:53_4: ādi-saddena tilasaṁguḷikādighanapūvañca saṅgaṇhāti. Kulagehaṁ na pavisitabbanti petadhūmena
anya-e0103n2:53_5: vāsitattā, pisācānubandhattā ca kulagehassa abbhantaraṁ na pavisitabbaṁ. Devasikaṁ
anya-e0103n2:53_6: chavaḍāho dhuvaḍāho. Matañātakānaṁ tattha gantvā devasikaṁ rodanaṁ dhuvarodanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:54_0: Susāne niccakālaṁ sivathikadassanena maraṇassatipaṭilābho. Tato eva appamādavihāritā.
anya-e0103n2:54_1: Tattha chaḍḍitassa matakaḷevarassa dassanena asubhanimittādhigamo. Tato eva kāmarāgavinodanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:54_3: Tato maraṇassatipaṭilābhato ca saṁvegabahulatā. Byādhikānaṁ, jarājiṇṇānañca matānaṁ
anya-e0103n2:54_4: tattha dassanena ārogyayobbanajīvitamadappahānaṁ. Khuddakassa, mahato ca bhayassa
anya-e0103n2:54_5: abhibhavanato bhayabheravasahanatā. Saṁviggassa yoniso padahanaṁ sambhavatīti amanussānaṁ
anya-e0103n2:57_0: 35. Senāsanagāhaṇe pare uṭṭhāpetvā gahaṇaṁ, ‘‘idaṁ sundaraṁ, idaṁ na sundara’’nti
anya-e0103n2:57_1: paritulayitvā pucchanā, olokanā ca senāsanaloluppaṁ. Tuṭṭhabbanti tussitabbaṁ. Vihārassa
anya-e0103n2:57_2: pariyantabhāvena dūreti vā bahūnaṁ sannipātaṭṭhānādīnaṁ accāsanneti vā pucchituṁ
anya-e0103n2:57_3: na labhati, pucchanenapissa dhutaṅgassa saṁkilissanato. Oloketunti loluppavasena
anya-e0103n2:57_4: passituṁ. Sacassa taṁ na ruccatīti assa yathāsanthatikassa taṁ yathāgāhitaṁ senāsanaṁ
anya-e0103n2:57_5: aphāsukabhāvena sace na ruccati, mudukassa asati roge yathāgāhitaṁ pahāya aññassa
anya-e0103n2:57_6: senāsanassa gahaṇaṁ loluppaṁ, majjhimassa gantvā olokanā, ukkaṭṭhassa pucchanā. Sabbesampi
anya-e0103n2:58_0: Upaṭṭhāpanīyānampi anuṭṭhāpanena sabrahmacārīnaṁ hitesitā. Tāya karuṇāvihārānuguṇatā.
anya-e0103n2:58_2: Tato eva anurodhavirodhappahānaṁ. Dvārapidahanaṁ okāsādānato. Yathāsanthatarāmatanti
anya-e0103n2:61_0: 36.Seyyanti iriyāpathalakkhaṇaṁ seyyaṁ. Tappaṭikkhepeneva hi tadatthā ‘‘mañco bhisī’’ti
anya-e0103n2:61_1: evamādikā (cūḷava. 321, 322) seyyā paṭikkhittā eva honti. ‘‘Nesajjiko’’ti ca sayanaṁ
anya-e0103n2:61_2: paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya eva viharituṁ sīlamassāti imassa atthassa idha adhippetattā
anya-e0103n2:61_3: seyyā evettha paṭiyoginī, na itare tathā aniṭṭhattā, asambhavato ca. Kosajjapakkhiyo

anya-e0103n2:61_5: nisajjāya eva yāpetuṁ tathā pavattetunti seyyāvettha paṭiyoginī. Tenāha ‘‘tena panā’’tiādi.

anya-e0103n2:62_0: Cattāro pādā, piṭṭhiapassayo cāti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi pañcaṅgo. Catūhi aṭṭanīhi,
anya-e0103n2:62_1: piṭṭhiapassayena ca pañcaṅgoti apare. Ubhosu passesu piṭṭhipasse ca yathāsukhaṁ apassāya
anya-e0103n2:62_2: viharato nesajjikassa ‘‘anesajjikato ko viseso’’ti gāhaṁ nivāretuṁ abhayatthero nidassito
anya-e0103n2:63_0: Upacchedīyati etenāti upacchedananti vinibandhupacchedassa sādhakatamabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n2:63_1: Sabbakammaṭṭhānānuyogasappāyatā alīnānuddhaccapakkhikattā nisajjāya. Tato eva pāsādikairiyāpathatā.
anya-e0103n2:63_2: Vīriyārambhānukūlatā vīriyasamatāyojanassa anucchavikatā. Tato eva sammāpaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n2:63_3: anubrūhanatā. Paṇidhāyāti ṭhapetvā. Tanunti uparimakāyaṁ. Vikampetīti cāleti, icchāvighātaṁ
anya-e0103n2:66_0: 37. Sekkhaputhujjanānaṁ vasena siyā kusalāni, khīṇāsavānaṁ vasena siyā abyākatāni.
anya-e0103n2:66_1: Tattha sekkhaputhujjanā paṭipattipūraṇatthaṁ, khīṇāsavā phāsuvihāratthaṁ dhutaṅgāni
anya-e0103n2:66_2: pariharanti. Akusalampi dhutaṅganti akusalacittenāpi dhutaṅgasevanā atthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:66_3: Taṁ na yuttaṁ, yena akusalacittena pabbajitassa āraññikattaṁ, taṁ dhutaṅgaṁ nāma
anya-e0103n2:66_4: na hoti. Kasmā? Lakkhaṇābhāvato. Yaṁ hidaṁ kilesānaṁ dhunanato dhutassa puggalassa,
anya-e0103n2:66_5: ñāṇassa, cetanāya vā aṅgattaṁ, na taṁ akusaladhammesu sambhavati. Tasmā araññavāsādimattena
anya-e0103n2:66_6: āraññikādayo tāva hontu, āraññikaṅgādīni pana na hontīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘na
anya-e0103n2:66_7: maya’’ntiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha imānīti dhutaṅgāni. Vuttaṁ heṭṭhā vacanatthaniddese.
anya-e0103n2:66_8: Na ca akusalena koci dhuto nāma hoti, kilesānaṁ dhunanaṭṭhenāti adhippāyo. Yassa
anya-e0103n2:66_9: bhikkhuno etāni samādānāni aṅgāni, etena paṭhamenāpi atthavikappena ‘‘natthi akusalaṁ
anya-e0103n2:66_10: dhutaṅga’’nti dasseti. Na ca akusalaṁ kiñci dhunātīti akusalaṁ kiñci pāpaṁ na ca
anya-e0103n2:66_11: dhunāti eva appaṭipakkhato. Yesaṁ samādānānaṁ taṁ akusalaṁ ñāṇaṁ viya aṅganti katvā
anya-e0103n2:66_12: tāni dhutaṅgānīti vucceyyuṁ. Iminā dutiyenāpi atthavikappena ‘‘natthi akusalaṁ dhutaṅga’’nti
anya-e0103n2:66_13: dasseti. Nāpi akusalantiādi tatiyaatthavikappavasena yojanā. Tasmātiādi vuttassevatthassa nigamanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:67_0: Yesanti abhayagirivāsike sandhāyāha. Te hi dhutaṅgaṁ nāma paññattīti vadanti. Tathā
anya-e0103n2:67_1: sati tassa paramatthato avijjamānattā kilesānaṁ dhunanaṭṭhopi na siyā, samādātabbatā
anya-e0103n2:67_2: cāti tesaṁ vacanaṁ pāḷiyā virujjhatīti dassetuṁ ‘‘kusalattikavinimutta’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:67_3: Tasmāti yasmā paññattipakkhe ete dosā dunnivārā, tasmā taṁ tesaṁ vacanaṁ na gahetabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:67_4: vuttanayo cetanāpakkhoyeva gahetabboti attho. Yasmā ete dhutaguṇā kusalattike paṭhamatatiyapadasaṅgahitā,
anya-e0103n2:67_5: tasmā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā,
anya-e0103n2:67_6: siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā,
anya-e0103n2:67_7: siyā asaṁkiliṭṭhasaṁkilesikāti evaṁ sesatikadukapadehipi nesaṁ yathārahaṁ saṅgaho vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0103n2:68_0: Kāmaṁ sabbopi arahā dhutakileso, idha pana dhutaṅgasevanāmukhena kilese vidhunitvā
anya-e0103n2:68_1: ṭhito khīṇāsavo ‘‘dhutakileso puggalo’’ti adhippeto. Tathā sabbopi ariyamaggo nippariyāyena
anya-e0103n2:68_2: kilesadhunano dhammo, visesato aggamaggo. Pariyāyena pana vipassanāñāṇādi. Heṭṭhimaparicchedena
anya-e0103n2:68_3: dhutaṅgacetanāsampayuttañāṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Evaṁ dhutaṁ dassetvā dhutavāde dassetabbe
anya-e0103n2:68_4: yasmā dhutavādabhedena dhuto viya dhutabhedena dhutavādopi duvidho, tasmā tesaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:68_5: tadubhayapaṭikkhepassa ca vasena catukkamettha sambhavatīti taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘atthi
anya-e0103n2:69_0: Tayidanti nipāto, tassa ‘‘so aya’’nti attho. Dhutadhammā nāmāti dhutaṅgasevanāya
anya-e0103n2:69_2: dhutaṅgacetanāya upakārakā dhammāti katvā dhutadhammā nāma. Asampattasampattesu paccayesu
anya-e0103n2:69_3: alubbhanākārena pavattanato appicchatā santuṭṭhitā ca atthato alobho. Paccayagedhādihetukānaṁ
anya-e0103n2:69_4: lolatādīnaṁ saṁkilesānaṁ sammadeva likhanato chedanato gaṇasaṅgaṇikādibhedato saṁsaggato
anya-e0103n2:69_5: cittassa vivecanato sallekhatā pavivekatā ca alobho amohoti imesu dvīsu dhammesu
anya-e0103n2:69_6: anupatanti tadantogadhā tappariyāpannā honti, tadubhayasseva pavattivisesabhāvato.
anya-e0103n2:69_7: Imehi kusaladhammehi atthī idamatthī, yena ñāṇena pabbajitena nāma paṁsukūlikaṅgādīsu
anya-e0103n2:69_8: patiṭṭhitena bhavitabbanti yathānusiṭṭhaṁ dhutaguṇe samādiyati ceva pariharati ca,
anya-e0103n2:69_9: taṁ ñāṇaṁ idamatthitā. Tenāha ‘‘idamatthitā ñāṇamevā’’ti. Paṭikkhepavatthūsūti gahapaticīvarādīsu
anya-e0103n2:69_10: tehi tehi dhutaṅgehi paṭikkhipitabbavatthūsu. Lobhanti taṇhaṁ. Tesveva vāti paṭikkhepavatthūsu
anya-e0103n2:69_13: Paṭisevanamukhenāti paṭisevanadvārena, tena lesenāti attho. Atisallekhamukhenāti
anya-e0103n2:69_14: ativiya sallekhapaṭipattimukhena, ukkaṭṭhassa vattanakānampi paṭikkhipanavasenāti attho.
anya-e0103n2:70_0: Sukhumakaraṇasannissayo rāgo dukkhāya paṭipattiyā patiṭṭhaṁ na labhatīti āha ‘‘dukkhāpaṭipadañca
anya-e0103n2:70_1: nissāya rāgo vūpasammatī’’ti. Sallekho nāma sampajānassa hoti, satisampajaññe moho
anya-e0103n2:70_2: apatiṭṭhova appamādasambhavatoti vuttaṁ ‘‘sallekhaṁ nissāya appamattassa moho pahīyatī’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:71_0: Sīsaṅgānīti sīsabhūtāni aṅgāni, paresampi kesañci nānantarikatāya, sukaratāya ca
anya-e0103n2:71_1: saṅgaṇhanato uttamaṅgānīti attho. Asambhinnaṅgānīti kehici sambhedarahitāni, visuṁyeva
anya-e0103n2:71_2: aṅgānīti vuttaṁ hoti. Kammaṭṭhānaṁ vaḍḍhati rāgacaritassa mohacaritassa dosacaritassāpi,
anya-e0103n2:71_3: taṁ ekaccaṁ dhutaṅgaṁ sevantassāti adhippāyo. Hāyati kammaṭṭhānaṁ sukumārabhāvenalūkhapaṭipattiṁ
anya-e0103n2:71_4: asahantassa. Vaḍḍhateva mahāpurisajātikassāti adhippāyo. Na vaḍḍhati kammaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0103n2:71_5: upanissayarahitassa. Ekameva hi dhutaṅgaṁ yathā kilesadhunanaṭṭhena, evaṁ cetanāsabhāvattā.
anya-e0103n2:72_0: Terasāpi dhutaṅgāni samādāya pariharantānaṁ puggalānaṁ vasena ‘‘dvācattālīsa hontī’’ti
anya-e0103n2:72_1: vatvā bhikkhūnaṁ terasannampi pariharaṇassa ekajjhaṁyeva sambhavaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sace
anya-e0103n2:72_2: hī’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha ‘‘ekappahārena sabbadhutaṅgāni paribhuñjituṁ sakkotī’’ti
anya-e0103n2:72_3: vuttaṁ. Kathaṁ abbhokāse viharantassa rukkhamūlikaṅgaṁ? ‘‘Channaṁ paṭikkhipāmi, rukkhamūlikaṅgaṁ
anya-e0103n2:72_4: samādiyāmī’’ti (visuddhi. 1.32) vacanato channe aruṇaṁ uṭṭhāpitamatte dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati,
anya-e0103n2:72_5: na abbhokāse, tasmā bhedahetuno abhāvena tampi arogameva. Tathā senāsanaloluppassa
anya-e0103n2:72_6: abhāvena yathāsanthatikaṅganti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Āraññikaṅgaṁ gaṇamhā ohīyanasikkhāpadena
anya-e0103n2:72_8: (pāci. 238-240). Pavāritāya hi bhikkhuniyā atirittaṁ katvā bhuñjituṁ na labbhati.
anya-e0103n2:72_9: Kappiye ca vatthusmiṁ lolatāpahānāya dhutaṅgasamādānaṁ, na akappiye, sikkhāpadeneva
anya-e0103n2:72_10: paṭikkhittattā. Aṭṭheva honti bhikkhuniyā saṁkaccikacīvarādīhi saddhiṁ pañcapi ticīvarasaṅkhameva
anya-e0103n2:72_11: gacchantīti katvā. Yathāvuttesūti bhikkhūnaṁ vuttesu terasasu ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato
anya-e0103n2:72_12: ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅgaṁ dvādasa sāmaṇerānaṁ. Sattāti bhikkhunīnaṁ vuttesu aṭṭhasu
anya-e0103n2:72_14: hi imaṁ anuvattamānameva katvā ‘‘satta sikkhamānasāmaṇerīna’’nti vuttaṁ. Patirūpānīti
